main: ^Oh we can see, that you got it! Good job. Come back later, when we manage to get the mineral opened to get the gift from us.
comebacklater: ^The thing that interests us the most is in the heart of this beauty. Like I said, come back in 3 months.
^When?! I don't have that much time. Couldn't you just give me the gift now?
nuhuh: ^That's not possible. Sorry, rules are rules. I mean if you could find a really strong acid...
^Strong acid... give me the mineral back. I'll be back soon with its heart.
